channel.title: GericFosse on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in GericFosse on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: Introducing Shipments in PrestaShop: finally solving the Multicarrier problem
item.description: We are introducing a fundamental paradigm shift in PrestaShopâ€™s core: moving the order management center of gravity from the Carrier to the Shipment.

item.title: Hummingbird v2.0.0 Beta Is Available
item.description: We are thrilled to announce the release of Hummingbird v2.0.0 Beta. This milestone is the result of a monumental effort, representing more than 320 commits, 500 file changes, 50,000 additions, and 30,000 deletions. The goal is to deliver a developer-first, lightweight, and modular theme that establishes a new standard for the PrestaShop ecosystem.

item.title: Update Assistant module v7.0.0 is available (Autoupgrade)
item.description: We are pleased to introduce the latest major release of the Update Assistant module (formerly known as 1-Click Upgrade).

item.title: Autoupgrade module v6.1.0 and 6.2.0 are Available (1-Click Upgrade)
item.description: In the footsteps of the latest module releases (see version 6.0.0 release blogpost), these versions bring a number of improvements to streamline PrestaShop updates. Explore the changelog below to find out what version 6.1.0 and 6.2.0 bring to the upgrade module.

item.title: Autoupgrade module v6.0.0 is Available (1-Click Upgrade)
item.description: In the footsteps of the latest module releases (see versions 5.0.2 and 5.0.3 live presentation), this version brings a number of improvements to streamline PrestaShop updates. Explore the changelog below to find out what version 6.0.0 brings to the Autoupgrade module.
